ARABIC: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When the waters rose We carried you in the ship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the water rose in flood, We bore you in the ark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily when the water rose to great heights, We bore you upon a floating vessel (i.e. the Ark)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When the flood rose high and covered the whole land, We carried you in the Ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed when the water swelled up, We boarded you onto the ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, when the water rose beyond its limits, We carried you in the ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We bore you up in the ship when the water rose high,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Lo, when the waters rose, We bore you in the running ship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! when the waters rose, We carried you upon the ship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But We bore you away in the Ark, when the waters rose high,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! when the water rose, We bare you upon the traversing ark.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed when the Flood rose high, We carried you in a floating ark,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We, when the water (of Noah's Flood) overflowed beyond its limits, carried you (mankind), in the floating (Ark),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! When the water rose beyond its limits [Nuh's (Noah) Flood], We carried you (mankind) in the floating [ship that was constructed by Nuh (Noah)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when the waters rose (high) We carried you in the sailing (Ark),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the waters overflowed, We carried you in the cruising ship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, when the water overflowed, We carried your ancestors in the sailing ship
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:11] Truly when the waters rose high, [when] they rose above all things including mountains and otherwise at the time of the Flood, We carried you, meaning, your forefathers, you being in their loins, in the sailing vessel, the ark which Noah built and by which he and those with him were saved while all the others drowned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! when the waters rose) at the time of Noah, (We carried you) community of Muhammad (pbuh) as well as all created beings in the loins of your fathers (upon the ship) in the ship of Noah.
